name: A Dream of Seven Flowers
description:
A Dream of Seven Flowers is a point and click adventure developed for PC.

You find yourself in an old Swedish village, picking flowers for a magic spell to enter the dream world. Ancient traditions and folklore are view through a new lens as you find what you’re looking for in a most unexpected way…

When you enter the dream, your inventory is already filled with items, embodied memories, which can be used it a multitude of combinations to progress. When a memory is used others are unlocked to gradually delve deeper in previously blocked experiences and through that fabric of the dream world itself.

Solve puzzles, uncover your past, interact with quirky characters and watch a magical story unfold in this game inspired by both old midsummer traditions and progressive themes!

The current build is about 30-60 min and was intended as the first part of a longer experience. The team has chosen to move on to other projects but we still wanted to share what we have been working on so far!
